name: @balancer-labs/v3-monorepo
contributors: João Bruno Abou Hatem de Liz <joao@balancerlabs.dev>

scripts.build: yarn workspaces foreach --parallel --jobs unlimited --verbose run build
scripts.lint: NODE_NO_WARNINGS=1 yarn workspaces foreach --parallel --jobs unlimited --verbose run lint
scripts.prettier: yarn workspaces foreach --parallel --jobs unlimited --exclude @balancer-labs/v3-common --exclude @balancer-labs/v3-helpers --exclude @balancer-labs/solidity-toolbox  --verbose run prettier
scripts.test: yarn workspaces foreach --parallel --jobs unlimited --verbose run test
scripts.test:hardhat: yarn workspaces foreach --parallel --jobs unlimited --verbose run test:hardhat
scripts.test:forge: yarn workspaces foreach --parallel --jobs unlimited --verbose run test:forge
scripts.coverage: yarn workspaces foreach --parallel --jobs unlimited --verbose run coverage
scripts.gas: yarn workspaces foreach --parallel --jobs unlimited --verbose run gas
scripts.slither-install: python3 -m venv slither && bash -c 'source slither/bin/activate && pip3 install https://github.com/crytic/slither/releases/download/0.10.1/0.10.1.zip'
scripts.slither: yarn workspaces foreach --parallel --jobs unlimited --verbose run slither
